entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued June 24 at 4:45AM AKDT by NWS

Wind gusts in excess of 55mph are possible as the light rain showers move from west to east. Severe weather is not expected as the rain showers move through the area. Reduce speeds if commuting on local roads while encountering gusty winds as dust may reduce visibility at times.
